InterwikiSortingSort.description: The default sort order to use. 'code' is build in and orders alphabetically by interwiki code.

InterwikiSortingSortPrepend.description: Codes that should appear at the start of the list of interwiki links.

InterwikiSortingInterwikiSortOrders.description: Definition of sort orders. Each sort order key should be the sort order name, for example 'alphabetical'. Each key should have a value of an array of interwiki codes in the order to be sorted.
